title: Having some issues posting to a specific board
body:
I'm having problems posting to the roleplay board, and I'd like to ask for permission(s?) so that I may be able to post there. My account is at the level 5 requirement for the board so I don't see why I'm having problems posting. 
Buddy said to post here asking for help so here's to hoping!

replies.body: So I've logged out of both then back into both, in the order you listed, and it seems I'm still having the same problem.
It looks like you're finally showing up as level 5 here on the boards. Try making your post again and let me know how it goes! ^.^

It looks like your Summoner and Boards profiles haven't synced. You may want to try logging into the game, then boards to see if your level updates. You're currently showing as level 1 here on the boards.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=vvXdErld,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-12-15T02:10:26.907+0000)
>
> It looks like your Summoner and Boards profiles haven't synced. You may want to try logging into the game, then boards to see if your level updates. You're currently showing as level 1 here on the boards.

That's especially weird considering I've logged into and out of both several times now :(( 
Thank you for the response, though! I'll do it a second time now to make sure if it works or not!!

> [{quoted}](name=TristanaISAHero,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=vvXdErld,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-12-15T02:20:26.104+0000)
>
> That's especially weird considering I've logged into and out of both several times now :(( 
> Thank you for the response, though! I'll do it a second time now to make sure if it works or not!!

Try it now.  I pressed a big scary button.
I hope it wasn't the one that says "Do Not Press" "Seriously under no circumstances should this be pressed" "We warned you!!!"
It worked bloody wonderfully thank you all!
